snippet.title: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 6 (PS2) - Gameplay
snippet.description:
Game: Pro Yakyuu Spirits 6
Console: PlayStation 2
Release Year: 2009

This is a full game in the '09 World Baseball Classic mode between US and Japan. I don't know who that pitcher Shields is supposed to be (clearly not James Shields?) but other than that, the U.S. roster is shockingly well done. 

Home run timestamps:
34:23

Gameplay from the PS3 version can be seen here: https://youtu.be/rK-eAJyIr2E

***
You can also check out my website about baseball video games at https://30-30.club.
